price: Allah buyurdu: Senden sonra biz, kavmini (Harun ile kalan İsrailoğullarını) imtihan ettik ve Sâmirî onları yoldan çıkardı.
arabic: قَالَ فَإِنَّا قَدۡ فَتَنَّا قَوۡمَكَ مِنۢ بَعۡدِكَ وَأَضَلَّهُمُ ٱلسَّامِرِيُّ

version.title: Turkish Translation - Ali Ozek
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by a group of scholars. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qāla fa-innā qad fatannā qawmaka min baʿdika wa-aḍallahumu al-sāmiriyu
